title: recipes_Slow_Cooker_New_England_Boiled_Dinner
text:
Title: Slow Cooker New England Boiled Dinner.
.
Description: Turkey ham is slowly cooked with potatoes, carrots, and pearl onion in this comforting, one-pot meal..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 pound whole turkey ham.
- 1 cup baby carrots.
- 4 large red potatoes, cubed.
- 6 cloves garlic.
- 0.5 head cabbage, cut into 6 wedges.
- 2 cups low-sodium chicken broth, as needed.
- 12 pearl onions.
.
Instructions:.
- Place turkey ham flat-side down over a bed of baby carrots and red potatoes in a slow cooker. Drop the garlic in and place the cabbage wedges over the turkey ham. Pour enough chicken broth to cover..
- Cook on Low for 8 hours, then stir in the pearl onions, cooking until the onions are tender, about 30 more minutes..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 312 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 51 g.
cholesterolContent: 55 mg.
fiberContent: 8 g.
proteinContent: 20 g.
saturatedFatContent: 1 g.
sodiumContent: 893 mg.
sugarContent: 8 g.
fatContent: 4 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 6 servings.
